"Show us your actual ability":
"Oh <%me>!
Are you working hard at the exploration?
Just to tell you this, if it is not Super Hard,
you will not enter while the exploration is being done!
Just for you, I have thought of an exploration menu
that can be attacked which consolidates the
recently-released new areas. Therefore, let us see
what level your ability is at this point!
*Clear with S rank on Super Hard and higher"
"アンタの実力、見せてもらうわ"

"あら<%me>！
探索、頑張ってる？
言っとくけど、スーパーハードじゃなきゃ
探索してるうちに入らないからね！
アンタのために、最近解放された新しい
エリアをまとめて攻略できる探索メニューを
考えてあげたから、今のアンタの実力が
どの程度かじっくり見せてもらうわよ！
